articles.description: Here’s what we currently know about how long people may be immune after they recover from COVID-19 or get the vaccine.
articles.content:
• For those who recover from COVID-19, immunity to the virus can last at least 8 months and maybe longer, research shows.
  • Immunity can occur naturally after developing COVID-19 or from … [+7510 chars]
